message: Let's be fair. I'll take the lion's share, but give you a small slice to start.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of this deal decreases for me with every round.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm not going to give you more than 20%.  The value of the deal is shrinking for both of us with every round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm proposing 40/60.  Accept this now, or the deal will be worth even less for me in the next round, while you remain unaffected.
